title: Failed to run optimizer ArithmeticOptimizer, stage RemoveStackStridedSliceSameAxis node vgg_16_1/rois/strided_slice_18. Error: Pack node (vgg_16_1/rois/stack_2) axis attribute is out of bounds: 1
body:
I trained TF-Faster R-CNN on Jetson Nano,I encountered the following problem:
```
ResourceExhaustedError (see above for traceback): OOM when allocating tensor with shape[25088,4096] and type float on /job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:0 by allocator GPU_0_bfc
	 [[node vgg_16/fc6/weights/Momentum/Assign (defined at /home/a/song/tf-faster-rcnn/tools/../lib/model/train_val.py:143) ]]
```

then，i changed batchsize=2，but i have the following problem again: 

```
WARNING:tensorflow:From /home/a/archiconda3/envs/tensorflow/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/training/saver.py:1266: checkpoint_exists (from tensorflow.python.training.checkpoint_management) is deprecated and will be removed in a future version.
Instructions for updating:
Use standard file APIs to check for files with this prefix.
Loaded.
Fix VGG16 layers..
Fixed.
2019-08-16 17:48:32.964956: W ./tensorflow/core/grappler/optimizers/graph_optimizer_stage.h:241] Failed to run optimizer ArithmeticOptimizer, stage RemoveStackStridedSliceSameAxis node vgg_16_1/rois/strided_slice_12. Error: Pack node (vgg_16_1/rois/stack) axis attribute is out of bounds: 1
2019-08-16 17:48:32.969390: W ./tensorflow/core/grappler/optimizers/graph_optimizer_stage.h:241] Failed to run optimizer ArithmeticOptimizer, stage RemoveStackStridedSliceSameAxis node vgg_16_1/rois/strided_slice_14. Error: Pack node (vgg_16_1/rois/stack) axis attribute is out of bounds: 1
2019-08-16 17:48:32.969454: W ./tensorflow/core/grappler/optimizers/graph_optimizer_stage.h:241] Failed to run optimizer ArithmeticOptimizer, stage RemoveStackStridedSliceSameAxis node vgg_16_1/rois/strided_slice_16. Error: Pack node (vgg_16_1/rois/stack) axis attribute is out of bounds: 1
2019-08-16 17:48:32.969516: W ./tensorflow/core/grappler/optimizers/graph_optimizer_stage.h:241] Failed to run optimizer ArithmeticOptimizer, stage RemoveStackStridedSliceSameAxis node vgg_16_1/rois/strided_slice_18. Error: Pack node (vgg_16_1/rois/stack) axis attribute is out of bounds: 1
```
who can help me?thanks!
